trans-unit.source: Specifies an installer for the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter"></xref> component.
trans-unit.target: 指定的安裝程式<xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter"></xref>元件。

trans-unit.source: The following information might help provide a performance improvement when installing performance counters at application startup.
trans-unit.target: 下列資訊可能有助於安裝應用程式啟動時的效能計數器時，提供改進效能。

trans-unit.source: Performance counter categories installed with .NET Framework version 2.0 use separate shared memories, with each performance counter category having its own memory.
trans-unit.target: 安裝.NET framework 2.0 版的效能計數器分類使用不同的共用的記憶體，且每個效能計數器分類有它自己的記憶體。

trans-unit.source: You can specify the size of separate shared memory by creating a DWORD named FileMappingSize in the registry key HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\\*\<category name>*\Performance.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定不同的共用記憶體的大小，藉由建立 DWORD 登錄機碼 HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services 中名為 FileMappingSize\\*\<類別名稱 >*\Performance。

trans-unit.source: The FileMappingSize value is set to the shared memory size of the category.
trans-unit.target: FileMappingSize 值設定為類別目錄的共用的記憶體的大小。

trans-unit.source: The default size is 131072 decimal.
trans-unit.target: 預設大小為 131072 十進位。

trans-unit.source: If the FileMappingSize value is not present, the `fileMappingSize` attribute value for the `performanceCounters` element specified in the Machine.config file is used, causing additional overhead for configuration file processing.
trans-unit.target: 如果 FileMappingSize 值不存在，`fileMappingSize`屬性值`performanceCounters`使用 Machine.config 檔案中指定的項目時，導致組態檔處理的額外負擔。

trans-unit.source: You can realize a performance improvement for application startup by setting the file mapping size in the registry.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由設定登錄中的檔案對應大小，達成應用程式啟動時的效能改善。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstaller"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstaller"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the descriptive message for the performance counter.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定效能計數器的描述性訊息。

trans-unit.source: The descriptive message for the performance counter.
trans-unit.target: 效能計數器的描述性訊息。

trans-unit.source: The value is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值設定為<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the performance category name for the performance counter.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定效能計數器的效能分類名稱。

trans-unit.source: The performance category name for the performance counter.
trans-unit.target: 效能計數器的效能分類名稱。

trans-unit.source: The value is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值設定為<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value is not a valid category name.
trans-unit.target: 值不是有效的類別名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the performance counter category type.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定效能計數器類別型別。

trans-unit.source: The CategoryType property specifies whether the performance counter category can have multiple instances.
trans-unit.target: CategoryType 屬性指定的效能計數器分類是否可以有多個執行個體。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterCategoryType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterCategoryType"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The value is not a <xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterCategoryType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值不是<xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterCategoryType"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Copies all the properties from the specified component that are required at install time for a performance counter.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的元件所需的所有屬性複製安裝效能計數器的時間。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstaller> can only install multiple counters in the same category.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstaller>只能在相同分類中安裝多個計數器。</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterInstaller>

trans-unit.source: The component to copy from.
trans-unit.target: 要複製的元件。

trans-unit.source: The specified component is not a <xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定的元件不是<xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: -or- The specified <xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter"></xref> is incomplete.
trans-unit.target: -指定<xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter"></xref>不完整。

trans-unit.source: -or- Multiple counters in different categories are trying to be installed.
trans-unit.target: -或者-不同分類的多個計數器嘗試安裝。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of data that pertains to the counters to install.
trans-unit.target: 取得要安裝的計數器相關資料的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Diagnostics.CounterCreationDataCollection"></xref> that contains the names, help messages, and types of the counters to install.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Diagnostics.CounterCreationDataCollection"> </xref> ，其中包含要安裝的名稱、 說明訊息和類型的計數器。

trans-unit.source: Performs the installation.
trans-unit.target: 執行安裝。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> that is used to save the information needed to perform a commit, rollback, or uninstall operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>，用來儲存執行認可、 所需的資訊復原或解除安裝作業。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Restores the computer to the state it was in before the installation.
trans-unit.target: 會將電腦還原到之前安裝的狀態。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> that contains the pre-installation state of the computer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>包含預先安裝狀態的電腦。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Removes an installation.
trans-unit.target: 移除安裝。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> that contains the post-installation state of the computer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>，包含電腦的後續安裝狀態。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the performance counter should be removed at uninstall time.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否應該移除效能計數器的解除安裝時間。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.UninstallAction"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Configuration.Install.UninstallAction"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Remove" name="Remove" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_Remove" name="Remove" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value is not an <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.UninstallAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值不是<xref href="System.Configuration.Install.UninstallAction"> </xref>。
